射通す: (いとおす) - to pierce; to penetrate
将に: (まさに) - (esp. 正に) exactly/surely/certainly; (esp. 将に) just (about to)/on the verge (of doing or happening); (esp. 当に) duly/naturally
将を射んと欲すれば先ず馬を射よ: (しょうをいんとほっすればまずうまをいよ) - (proverb) He that would the daughter win, must with the mother first begin
将中に将たる: (しょうちゅうにしょうたる) - to be a leader among leaders
将几: (しょうぎ) - camp stool; folding stool
将来ビジョン: (しょうらいビジョン) - vision for the future
将来像: (しょうらいぞう) - vision of the future
将来展望: (しょうらいてんぼう) - future outlook; outlook for the future
将来性: (しょうらいせい) - future prospects; promise
将来有望: (しょうらいゆうぼう) - of great promise; with a promising future
将棋の盤: (しょうぎのばん) - Japanese chessboard; shogi board
将棋の駒: (しょうぎのこま) - chessmen; shogi pieces
将棋を指す: (しょうぎをさす) - to play shogi
将棋倒し: (しょうぎだおし) - falling one after another
将棋倒れ: (しょうぎだおれ) - falling one after another
将軍家: (しょうぐんけ) - family positioned to accede to the shogunate
将軍職: (しょうぐんしょく) - the shogunate
專門: (せんもん) - speciality; specialty; subject of study; expert; area of expertise
尉官: (いかん) - officer below the rank of major; company officer
尉鶲: (ジョウビタキ) - Daurian redstart (Phoenicurus auroreus)
尊: (filho/tatuagem/todo) - revered , zun (ancient Chinese wine vessel, usu. made of bronze); counter for buddhas
尊い: (たっとい) - precious; valuable; priceless; noble; exalted; sacred
尊ぶ: (たっとぶ) - to value; to prize; to esteem; to respect
尊む: (たっとむ) - to value; to prize; to honor; to respect
尊像: (そんぞう) - statue of a noble character; your picture
尊兄: (そんけい) - elder brother; elderly person
尊卑: (そんぴ) - high and low; aristocrat and plebeian
尊厳死: (そんげんし) - death with dignity; natural death (as opposed to extending one's life unnaturally with life support)
尊号: (そんごう) - honorary title; title of honour; title of honor
尊君: (そんくん) - someone's father; one's companion
尊堂: (そんどう) - your family; your mother
尊大不遜: (そんだいふそん) - (yoji) arrogant and presumptuous; haughty arrogance; intolerable insolence
尊大語: (そんだいご) - speech used by the speaker to convey the social stature between the speaker and listener; language conveying that the speaker is of greater social status than the listener
尊属: (そんぞく) - direct ancestors; noble ancestors
尊属殺人: (そんぞくさつじん) - patricide; parricide; matricide
尊慮: (そんりょ) - your will; your idea
尊族: (そんぞく) - direct ancestors; noble ancestors
尊王: (そんのう) - reverence for the emperor; advocate of imperial rule
尊王攘夷: (そんのうじょうい) - (yoji) 19th century slogan advocating reverence for the Emperor and the expulsion of (barbarian) foreigners
尊王討幕: (そんのうとうばく) - reverence for the emperor and the overthrow of the shogunate
尊皇: (そんのう) - reverence for the emperor; advocate of imperial rule
尊皇攘夷: (そんのうじょうい) - (yoji) 19th century slogan advocating reverence for the Emperor and the expulsion of (barbarian) foreigners
尊皇王: (そんのう) - reverence for the emperor; advocate of imperial rule
尊皇王攘夷: (そんのうじょうい) - (yoji) 19th century slogan advocating reverence for the Emperor and the expulsion of (barbarian) foreigners
尊者: (そんじゃ) - Buddhist saint; man of high repute; guest of honor; guest of honour
尊長: (そんちょう) - one's superiors; one's seniors
尋ぬ: (たんぬ) - (v2n-s,vt)    to ask/to enquire/to inquire; to search/to look for/to look into/to investigate
尋ねる: (tazuneru) - perguntar, indagar, investigar; procurar, buscar, examinar, investigar
尋ね人: (たずねびと) - missing person; wanted person
尋ね出す: (たずねいだす) - to locate; to discover
